1.1.name: wordpress/simple-login
1.1.description:
This widget was made to replace the built-in meta widget, if sidebar space is precious. Also, one can select where to redirect the users after a successful login: the admin panel, the blog's main site, the currently visited site where the login link was activated, or any custom field.

Might work with older versions that has widget support.
